casebody.data:
Desiree BLOCK
v.
Matthew BLOCK No. 389P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019 Mark Spencer Williams, Attorney at Law, Christine M. Sprow, Attorney at Law, Wilmington, Richard Forrest Kern, Attorney at Law, for Block, Desiree. R. Michael Schmidt, III, Attorney at Law, for Block, Matthew.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 5th of November 2018 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."
